Description:
One of a Kind
Once in a while the ultimate in family living comes on the market. Luxurious in every sense this young, masterfully crafted home exudes quality and upgrades that will make you the envy of family and friends. This 51 square family home has no less than three cleverly designed living zones and create the much sought after requirements of modern living. Upstairs occupies 3 of the biggest bedrooms you will ever see and the theatre room with 105 inch home cinema that leads to the balcony is a sanctuary in itself; the sensational Master bedroom is nearly as big a single level house in itself with a dressing room and ensuite.
Downstairs the expansive, flowing floor plan begins with a large bedroom and shower facilities. Enter the hub of the home which takes you to the exquisite kitchen with its quality appliances, stone bench tops, and WIP, family and dining areas (which leads out to the alfresco) round out this impressive living zone. Other notable features include Soaring High Ceilings, 3 Ensuites (4 bathrooms) and 5 toilets, ducted heating system, evaporative cooling system, alarm system, extra-large garage with internal and rear drive through access. This home is close to parks, primary schools and public transport and just a short drive to the Western Ring Road, shopping centres and Deer Park Train Station.
For those that like the finer things in life, the ultimate package in family living and entertaining is there for the taking.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
The Pinnacle of Perfection
Set on a generous size 720sm (approx) block, this absolute gem is awaiting the homeowner who wants it all. Showcasing impeccable workmanship alongside modern family Luxury living in one of Derrimut's finest locations.
This 35 square (approx) home boasts a superb floor plan comprising of 4 lavish bedrooms, 2 bathrooms as well as a generous ensemble of living rooms.
Upon entering, guests are greeted by an impressive entry with a stunning feature vase as a showpiece. The home also comprises a generous study room/ 5th bedroom, dining area, casual living room, powder room and Theatre room. The gourmet kitchen includes Miele appliances, plenty of cupboards to fill and walk in pantry.
At the rear is a decadent master suite complete with a dressing room and double vanity and double shower luxury en suite that completes the room which enables you to immerse yourself in absolute seclusion and serenity.
For leisure, the astounding property offers an exciting variety of indoor and outdoor options. It comprises a year round alfresco area with Bi-Fold doors.
To further ensure a lifestyle of effortless peace and comfort, convenience and pleasure, the property also provides secure garaging for 2 cars, separate laundry, block out blinds, comfort glass, full security, intercom, ducted vacuum and sophisticated multi-zoned heating/cooling and landscaping contribute to this fine property.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Build Your Dream Home
One of the few remaining blocks of land in this sought after estate.
The estate provides schooling, parks, community centre, a vibrant shopping centre and specialty shops, transport close to main arterial roads and the Ring Road.
A vibrant estate attracting attention from buyers and this is your opportunity to put your stamp on this block and enjoy the benefits living in this estate.
Land size 15m x 31m (465sm) approx
Buy the land and arrange your own build or we can help with a house and land package.
Ring now before it's to late.

Description:
Prime Position, Low Maintenance Opportunity!
A rare opportunity to secure this good sized family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 20 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move or investment. Comprising three generous sized bedrooms & generous master with WIR & en-suite and three remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the spacious tiled open plan living/dining room and remaining bedroom, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a fully concreted internal entertaining area and good sized rear yard. Features include; remote garage with internal through access, high ceilings, stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating and
split system cooling.
An opportunity like this doesn't show up often. Don't delay and enquire today!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Beautifully maintained and presenting in pristine condition this lovely Derrimut residence is an absolute credit to its current owners and provides flexibility to suit all buyer requirements as the floorplan can easily be converted into a 4 bedroom + study home whilst still retaining two large living spaces. The home comprises a superb Caesarstone benchtop kitchen that overlooks the dining and main living and flows out to the great rear yard featuring a gorgeous paved entertainment zone with feature wall that provides privacy from neighbours and a good size play area for the kids. Sleeping quarters currently comprise 3 spacious bedrooms, the luxurious master bedroom featuring WIR and ensuite and a separate study that can easily be converted into a 4th bedroom. Completing the home is a large theatre room that can also be used as a formal lounge or rumpus room and a fantastic retreat area with alfresco providing the perfect space to substitute as a study if you utilise the current study as a bedroom, quiet indoor sitting area to read your favorite book or magazine on those cold winter days or peaceful outdoor space to wind down with a chilled glass of wine or beer on those warm summer evenings. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings, designer lighting, alarm, quality window furnishings, an abundance of storage options, landscaped low maintenance gardens, double remote garage with internal access and so much more.
Insights: 37 Palmer Parade, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
Outdoor living at its finest, a huge allotment ( 632sqm approx. ) , five (5) bedrooms and off street parking for 7 vehicles ( 2 in double remote garage , 2 in the double driveway and 3 on the extended crossover ) are just a few of the standout features of this lovely Derrimut residence. The home comprises an open plan kitchen with huge walk in pantry, stone benches and 900mm appliances that overlooks the dining/ living area and huge rumpus room. All these areas flow out to the amazing outdoor living space complete with bar and stereo system creating an enormous entertaining zone when all combined. Other features include a separate lounge / theatre room, high ceilings, parquetry flooring , ducted heating , evaporative cooling, alarm , huge shower and twin vanity ensuite, 5KW solar panel system , storage shed, beautiful established low maintenance gardens and so much more. Positioned directly adjacent to magnificent Bothwell Park is the cherry on top of this absolute gem that promises to be popular.
Insights: 108 Westminster Parkway, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
An Affordable Start In Derrimut
What a great way to start with this well priced four bedroom home. This well maintained home is set just a stone's throw away from schools, shops, child care center, public transport and loads more family amenities.
This abode consists four bedrooms all consisting of versatile built in robes and the master bedroom including a fully fitted en-suite adjoined to your his & hers built in robes.
With an open plan layout allows you to entertain in your quality kitchen while you overlook your sun filled dining and your semi adjoined family room.
The home has access to the double car garage with remote control via an internal door into from home for added piece of mind.
Quality fixtures and fittings included are high ceilings, downlights, ducted heating, reverse cycle cooling, stone benches and loads more.
An inspection is a must.
PRD Nationwide | Sell Smarter

Description:
IMPECCABLY FRESH
First impressions are lasting as is the lifetime of enjoyment offered by this 2 year young home carrying an instantly appealing facade that precedes the stylish & contemporary interior. Soaked with natural light, its generously-proportioned layout flows over a single level for effortless living hosting 4 bedrooms + study nook, main with an ensuite and WIR, others with built ins and serviced by the main bathroom. Offering multiple living zones including a formal lounge and open plan living, dining & modern kitchen (with WIP, SS appliances and dishwasher) seamlessly flowing through to an alfresco for all year round entertaining, surrounded by a sizeable yet low maintenance landscaped yard with side access potential. Features extend to ducted heating, air-conditioning, downlights, solar hot water, 6 star rating, remote double garage with internal access, well-appointed laundry, ample storage space and more. Close to bus stops, parks and shops. Perfect for the young family, first home buyer or astute investor. Call now and make this house your home
PHOTO I.D. REQUIRED AT ALL OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
Beautiful home In Great Location
This home in the acclaimed Brimbank Garden Estate will surely tick all the boxes!
Upon entering the home you are greeted by the formal lounge then flowing on through the property to the open plan Kitchen, meals and family living area. The modern chef's kitchen awaits you with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and stone bench tops.
Comprising of 4 bedrooms with built in robes, master bedroom has a walk in robe and ensuite. The central bathroom includes a shower and bath with a separate toilet for convenience. The backyard is designed to be low maintenance.
Only minutes from schools, shopping centres, parks, freeway access and public transport.
Other features include ducted heating, split system air-conditioning cooling, double car garage with remote and internal/external access and much more. Inspect today!

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Stockdale Leggo Real Estate proudly presents 100 Lennon Parkway Derrimut , a magnificent Metricon residence that offers everything you could ever desire. From its cutting edge faade, ultra modern interior , amazing alfresco with outdoor kitchen, huge rear yard , and extra oversized garage with workshop, this home provides highlights and upgrades where it really matters. The home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms , master with WIR and double vanity, oversize shower ensuite and a huge open plan kitchen featuring stone benches , glass splashback, 900mm stainless steel appliances and extended breakfast bar that overlooks the dining and expansive main living area that flows out to the alfresco creating that indoor /outdoor living we all love. Other features include kids retreat or second living space, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, high ceilings, designer lighting, alarm, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters and e screens with blockouts, internal access from garage, beautiful landscaped gardens , storage shed , double driveway and a premier location only a short stroll from all of Derrimut's amenities. All this on a massive corner block of approx. 600sqm land with possible side access providing plenty of space for the boat , caravan or huge workshed.
Insights: 100 Lennon Parkway, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT BY DAVID ZAMMIT MORE PROPERTIES WANTED
Standing impressively on land of (approx) 980sqm this substantial five bedrooms, three bathrooms, two-storey residence takes pride of place in one of Derrimut`s most sought-after locations.
This grand family home provide luxury and expertly-designed home puts the focus on family function with clearly defined living zones and a choice of 2 massive outdoor areas for entertaining or quiet relaxation.
Beyond the entrance foyer comprises of formal living and study luxuriate in space and natural lighting. Well-appointed kitchen with SS appliance's.
Family, meals and rumpus which all leads out to a first class out door entertaining areas separate theatre Down Stairs; master bedroom, full ensuite with Spa and separate toilet Upstairs 4 huge bedrooms all with mirror sliding doors and ceiling fans central bathroom and games room. 5 car garage with rear access.
Other inclusions:
C-Bus automation system which controls all lighting system, blinds, fountains, aircon, home theatre system, Refrigerated cooling and ducted heating x2,
Security camera inside and outside with fully monitored alarm system.
10 person outdoor spa.
Ducted vacuum system and much more to see...
Please call for full list of inclusions as too many to mention.
Photo ID Required for inspection.
Auction 27 August @1pm.

With a sophisticated and contemporary interior highlighted by gorgeous flooring , this lovely Derrimut residence exudes warmth and is an absolute credit to its current owners. The fantastic design offers everything you could ever wish for, 4 spacious bedrooms serviced by 2 great bathrooms and an open plan kitchen overlooking the dining and living space that lead to the alfresco and yard. With everything already done for you, just move in and enjoy the comfort and modern touches of a home you will look forward to coming home to every night, and most certainly be proud to own.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Just one word WOW. This truly special residence combines a contemporary and sophisticated interior highlighted by gorgeous bamboo flooring with an absolutely first class position directly in front of a magnificent recreation reserve complete with swings, undercover BBQ area and expansive grassed spaces for the kids to run around and play. Presenting as new and offering every sort of formal and informal living area imaginable the home comprises a gorgeous stone benchtop kitchen featuring glass splashback, walk in pantry, 900mm appliances and dishwasher that overlooks the meals, family and rumpus room that leads outside through bi fold doors to the massive undercover outdoor entertainment area ( 12.5m x 3.0m ) and good size rear yard ( land approx. 508sqm ). Rivalling any 5 star hotel, the enormous master bedroom provides every day of the year comfort , luxury and relaxation usually only reserved for that special holiday with huge retreat , dual WIR's , twin vanities , double shower and glorious views of the park. Three additional bedrooms serviced by the lovely main bathroom , a separate lounge and formal dining / open study complete the home and add to the limitless living and entertaining zones this fantastic design offers. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, designer lighting, alarm, quality window furnishings, double remote garage with internal access and low maintenance front and rear gardens with storage shed, artificial grass and automatic sprinkler system. The perfect home to raise your family, to enjoy those precious moments and create those cherished memories is finally on the market for one lucky purchaser.

Description:
Nest or Invest
This lovely 3 bedroom home presents an affordable opportunity for first home buyers to get into the market or investors looking to capitalise on the booming Derrimut market. Sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with ensuite and walk through robe plus 2 additional bedrooms with BIRs serviced by a central bathroom. Multiple living /entertaining zones include a separate lounge room and an open plan kitchen overlooking the dining that leads to the second living area. Other features include ducted heating and, double remote garage with internal access.
Within close proximity to schools, public transport, parkland's, Derrimut village shopping centre & easy access to freeways.
Inspections are a must!
Land size 489m2
